languages.text: "Мне нужен был силовой инструмент потрясающей мощи, чтобы держать в узде своих ксеносоюзников. Ангелы Императора подходили для этой роли, но... С учетом специфики моей операции, не мог же я призвать на помощь Караул Смерти, они бы моментально выяснили мои замыслы. И тогда я вспомнил про старый долг от ордена Космических волков".

"I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."
languages.original_text: "Мне нужен был силовой инструмент потрясающей мощи, чтобы держать в узде своих ксеносоюзников. Ангелы Императора подходили для этой роли, но... С учетом специфики моей операции, не мог же я призвать на помощь Караул Смерти, они бы моментально выяснили мои замыслы. И тогда я вспомнил про старый долг от ордена Космических волков".

traits.locale_text: "I needed the power weaopons of the greatest might to keep my xeno-allies under my heel. The Emperor's Angels were a good fit for the role, but... Considering the specificity of my operation, I couldn't just have summoned the Deathwatch to help, could I? And then I remembered an old debt of the Space Wolves order."

"I needed the power weaopons of the greatest might to keep my xeno-allies under my heel. The Emperor's Angels were a good fit for the role, but... Considering the specificity of my operation, I couldn't just have summoned the Deathwatch to help, could I? And then I remembered an old debt of the Space Wolves order."

"I needed the power weapons of the greatest might to keep my xeno-allies under my heel. The Emperor's Angels fit the bill, except... Considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't just have summoned the Deathwatch to my aid, could I? And then I remembered an old debt of the Space Wolves order."

"I needed the power weapons of the greatest might to keep my xeno-allies under my heel. The Emperor's Angels fit the bill, except... Considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't just have summoned the Deathwatch to my aid, could I? And then I remembered an old debt of the Space Wolves order."

"I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well summon the Deathwatch to my aid, could I? That's when I remembered an old debt the Space Wolves Chapter owed me."

"I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

languages.text: « J'avais besoin d'une force remarquable pour veiller à ce que mes alliés xénos se tiennent correctement. Les anges de l'Empereur représentaient l'arme idéale, à un détail près... Étant donné la nature confidentielle de mon opération, vous comprendrez que je ne pouvais pas vraiment solliciter l'aide de la Deathwatch. C'est alors que je me suis souvenu que les Space Wolves avaient une vieille dette envers moi. J'ai donc décidé qu'il était temps qu'ils la remboursent. »
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

traits.locale_text: « J'avais besoin d'une force remarquable pour veiller à ce que mes alliés xénos se tiennent correctement. Les anges de l'Empereur représentaient l'arme idéale, à un détail près... Étant donné la nature confidentielle de mon opération, vous comprendrez que je ne pouvais pas vraiment solliciter l'aide de la Deathwatch. C'est alors que je me suis souvenu que les Space Wolves avaient une vieille dette envers moi. »

languages.text: «Necesitaba una fuerza excepcional para mantener a raya a mis aliados xenos. Los ángeles del Emperador eran el arma ideal, solo que... dada la naturaleza delicada de mi operación, no podía arriesgarme a solicitar ayuda a mis aliados Vigías de la Muerte, ¿no? Fue entonces cuando recordé una vieja deuda que me debía una Gran Compañía de Lobos Espaciales, de modo que decidí pedirles un favor».
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitaba armas de energía del mayor calibre posible para mantener a raya a mis aliados xenos. Los Ángeles del Emperador me habrían servido bien, solo que... dada la delicadeza de esta operación, no podía recurrir a los Vigías de la Muerte, ¿no le parece? Fue entonces cuando recordé una vieja deuda que me debía la orden de los Lobos Espaciales».

languages.text: “我需要非常强大的力量，来控制我那些异形盟友，让他们不要轻举妄动。帝皇的天使刚好符合我的要求，不过……考虑到这个计划的敏感程度，我总不能让死亡守望的盟友们来帮忙吧？那个时候，我便想起了太空野狼欠我的人情，于是我决定请他们来帮这个忙。”
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

traits.locale_text: “我需要最为强大的力量，来控制我那些异形盟友，让他们不要轻举妄动，而帝皇的天使刚好符合我的要求。不过……考虑到这个计划的敏感程度，我总不可能让死亡守望的星际战士来帮忙吧？那个时候，我便想起了太空野狼欠我的人情。”

languages.text: "Ich habe eine erstaunlich starke Truppe benötigt, um meine Xenos-Verbündeten im Zaum zu halten. Die Engel des Imperators waren genau die richtige Waffe, nur ... konnte ich angesichts der heiklen Natur meiner Operation nicht riskieren, meine Verbündeten in der Deathwatch um Hilfe zu bitten, nicht wahr? Und dann fiel mir ein, dass eine Großkompanie der Space Wolves noch in meiner Schuld stand. Also entschied ich, einen Gefallen einzufordern."
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die stärksten Energiewaffen benötigt, um meine Xeno-Verbündeten unter Kontrolle zu halten. Die Engel des Imperators waren gut geeignet, nur ... Angesichts der heiklen Natur meiner Operation hätte ich wohl kaum einfach die Deathwatch zur Hilfe rufen können, nicht wahr? Und dann ist mir eine alte Schuld des Ordens der Space Wolves eingefallen."

languages.text: 「ゼノの同盟を抑え込むには、非常に強力な力が必要だった。皇帝の天使は、その条件に合致するものだった。だが…私の作戦の機密性を考えると、デスウォッチを呼び出すわけにはいかなかった。そこで、私はスペースウルフ群狼団に古い借りがあることを思い出し、その借りを返してもらうことにした」
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の同盟者を抑え込むには、最強のパワーウェポンが必要だった。皇帝の天使は、その条件に合致するものだった。だが…私の作戦の機密性を考えると、デスウォッチを呼び出すわけにはいかなかった。そこで、私はスペースウルフに古い借りがあることを思い出したのだ」

languages.text: "Zeno müttefiklerimi kontrol altında tutabilmek için oldukça kuvvetli bir güce ihtiyaç duydum. İmparator'un Melekleri, tam da aradığım silahtı. Sadece... Operasyonumun ne kadar hassas olduğunu göz önüne aldığımda ölümün eşiğindeki müttefiklerimden yardım alma riskini göze alamazdım, değil mi? Sonra bir Uzay Kurtları Büyük Bölüğü'nün bana olan eski bir borcunu hatırladım. Onları yardıma çağırmaya karar verdim."
languages.original_text: "I needed a remarkably strong force to keep my xenos allies in check. The Emperor's Angels were just the weapon I was looking for, except... considering the sensitive nature of my operation, I couldn't very well risk requesting aid from my allies in the Deathwatch, could I? And then I remembered an old debt owed to me by a Space Wolves Great Company. So I decided to call in a favour."
